channel.title: [Turbo] GI Turbo version 2.0: The Unseen, Mafia, Weaver, and Aetherborn are victorious!
channel.description:
Rules and such blatantly stolen from Merc's thread.
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-grand-idea-class-thread-v2/78691/
* days 15 mins, expect twilight to be 2 mins, nights 5 mins and expect aurora to take more 5 minutes as well * early day actions are usually processed during the day, late day actions are twilight material because of the host’s speed * setup will only start if more than 50% of the players of the players are from good/neut factions * there can be two kings or madness alike, but elections will only occur when there are no kings * there is a lot of info to compute so the first twilight post (after I announce “this is hammer”) is a strike and the second one is a modkill * lynch is majority and plurality * players can join at pre-game start but balance isn’t guaranteed
Player list 1. ~~KyoDaz~~ - died D1 - Laura Lee 3. Magnus 4. SirDerpsALot ~~5. Squid~~ - died N2 - Good King 6. Mercenary 7. ~~Sulit~~ - died N1 - Charlotte 8. Isaac ~~9. Kai_5~~ - executed D2 - Luxy 10. Soulshade55r [...]

item.description:

The Unseen (@Mercenary), the Weaver (@Isaac_Gonzalez), the Aetherborn (@SirDerpsAlot), and the Mafia (@Magnus and @Soulshade55r) are victorious. Congratulations!
